timeline.text: They say the place you start… shapes the man you become.

timeline.name: Griff
timeline.text: They say the place you start… shapes the man you become.
For me, that place was Delaware. Wilmington. Blood on bricks. Pain in the pavement.

timeline.name: Griff
timeline.text: For me, that place was Delaware. Wilmington. Blood on bricks. Pain in the pavement.

timeline.name: Griff
timeline.text: By 17, I had more funerals than birthdays. I wasn’t living, just breathing.

timeline.name: Griff
timeline.text: I left for Maryland with forty dollars… and met Kevin.

timeline.name: Kevin
timeline.text: You got hustle in your eyes, boy. You just don’t know what gear to use.

timeline.name: Griff
timeline.text: He taught me cars—and how to breathe without watching my back.

timeline.name: Griff
timeline.text: But I wanted more. I chased Los Angeles.
The glamour faded fast—couches, fake friends, and smoke chasing peace.

timeline.name: Griff
timeline.text: The glamour faded fast—couches, fake friends, and smoke chasing peace.

timeline.name: Griff
timeline.text: If the streets made me… maybe I can unmake myself.
